sesp-desc: Adds some extra special properties to all pages
sesp-property-author-desc: "$1" records all users that edited a page. It is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-first-author-desc: "$1" records the user that created a page. It is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-revision-id-desc: "$1" records the current revision ID of a page. It is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-page-id-desc: "$1" records the ID of a page. It is is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-page-len-desc: "$1" records the length of a page in bytes. It is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-page-img-desc: "$1" records the PageImages (Extension:PageImages) of a page . It is is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-view-count-desc: "$1" records the number of page views of a page. It is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-description-desc: "$1" records the description of page views of a page. It is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-subpages-desc: "$1" records all subpages of a page. It is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-revisions-desc: "$1" records the number of revisions of a page. It is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-talk-revisions-desc: "$1" records the number of revisions of a talk page. It is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-shorturl-desc: "$1" records the short URL of a page. It is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-approved-rev-desc: "$1" records the revision ID of a page that has been approved. It is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-namespace-id-desc: "$1" records the namespace ID of a page. It is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-namespace-name-desc: "$1" records the namespace canonical name of a page. It is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-approved-by-desc: "$1" records the user who set the approval status of the page. It is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-approved-date-desc: "$1" records the time when the approval status of the page was set. It is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-approved-status-desc: "$1" records the approval status of a page. It is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-user-registration-date-des: "$1" records the user's registration date. It is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-user-edit-count-desc: "$1" records the user's edit count. It is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-user-edit-count-per-ns-des: "$1" records the user's edit count in certain namespace. It is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-user-edit-count-ns-desc: "$1" records the namespace number in the user's edit count record. It is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-user-edit-count-cnt-desc: "$1" records the edit count in the user's edit count record. It is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-user-block-desc: "$1" records a list of blocks applied to a user. It is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-user-right-desc: "$1" records a list of rights applied to a user. It is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-user-group-desc: "$1" records a list of groups applied to a user. It is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-exif-data-desc: "$1" records the file's EXIF data. It is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-admin-deprecation-notice-title-repl: The following section contains settings that were renamed or otherwise modified and it is recommended to forthwith update their name or format.
sesp-config-uses-fixed-tables: To setup properties as fixed properties in order to improve data access
sesp-config-exclude-bot-edits: Should edits via user accounts in usergroup "bot" be ignored when storing data for the special properties?
